[timeout?](doc/markdown/./base.httpfsoptions.timeout.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Request timeout in milliseconds for HTTP operations. Defaults to 30000.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[urlResolver?](doc/markdown/./base.httpfsoptions.urlresolver.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

(url: string) =&gt; string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional URL pre-processor. If provided, every incoming VFS path is first passed through this resolver to produce the final URL or path string.

Use cases: - Rewriting logical VFS paths to CDN URLs - Injecting cache-busting query params - Mapping to object/data URLs


</td></tr>
